entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator should not generate source for types without members #94142
  • Dont know how to install .NET on raspberry pi #94141
  • No way to set the .NET entry assembly from unmanaged host? Also, documentation seems to be wrong/unclear. #94139
  • System.Text.Json JsonSourceGenerationOptions for Encoder? #94135
  • [API Proposal]: UnsafeGCHandle (like GCHandle, but this time it's great™️) #94134
  • [browser] Replace "blazor" prefix with "wasm" for common MSBuild properties #94133
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Lazy loading should be extension agnostic #94132
    9.0.0
  • Detect generic cycles in the Roslyn analyzer #94131
  • [API Proposal]: ProcessStartInfo.CreateSuspended, Process.Resume #94127
    9.0.0

Closed

  • JIT/CheckProjects tool isn't used correctly in CI #76087

PullRequests

Created

  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: update tail call IR validity checks #94130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x*AndUnzip and LoadVector128x*AndUnzip APIs #94128
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove the JIT/CheckProjects tool #94121
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Build the net8 workload msis #94125
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [browser][Wasm.Build.Tests] Use trimmer friendly JSON serialization #94034
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use the native cross compilers on win-arm64 #92443
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    needs-area-label
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    os-ios
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • make Http2_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException test more deterministic #94112
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • enable two HTTP POST tests #94115
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
